references.reason: This paper introduces the Segment Anything Model (SAM), the foundational model for the adversarial attacks explored in the current research.
This seminal work establishes the foundation of adversarial attacks, which are directly relevant to the current study.
This paper proposes a momentum-based method to enhance the effectiveness of adversarial attacks which is relevant to the MUI-GRAT technique discussed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Enhancing adversarial example transferability with an intermediate level attack
references.reason: The paper's focus on enhancing adversarial example transferability is highly relevant given the research question and the core method of the paper.

references.paper_title: On success and simplicity: A second look at transferable targeted attacks
references.reason: This paper contributes to the understanding and improvement of transferability in adversarial attacks, directly impacting the proposed UMI-GRAT's efficacy.
